measured_by: 7-point scale for moral wrongness; 7-point scale for moral character
justification: Participants were asked to rate the moral wrongness of actions and the moral character of agents performing actions using 7-point scales, where higher scores indicated greater perceived morality. This measurement was used across all three experiments to capture perceptions related to legality and moral evaluations.

topic_or_construct: respect for authority as a moral virtue
justification: The Moral Foundations Questionnaire was used to assess participants' endorsement of respect for authority as a moral virtue. The MFQ includes items pertaining to the moral foundation of authority, allowing researchers to explore its relationship with the influence of legal status on moral evaluations.
